text: Platycythara is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Mangeliidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Platycythara include: * Platycythara curta (Dall, 1919) * Platycythara elata (Dall, 1889) * Platycythara electra (Dall, 1919) * † Platycythara eurystoma W.P. Woodring, 1928 ;Species brought intoi synonymy: * † Platycythara metria (Dall 1903): synonym of Vitricythara metria (Dall, 1903) ==References== * Woodring, W. P. "Miocene molluscs from Bowden, Jamaica. Part 2: gastropods and discussion of results. Contributions to the geology and palaeontology of the West Indies." Carnegie Institute Washington Publication 385 (1928): 144-201. ==External links== * Bouchet P., Kantor Yu.I., Sysoev A. & Puillandre N. (2011) A new operational classification of the Conoidea. Journal of Molluscan Studies 77: 273-308 * * Worldwide Mollusc Species Data Base: Mangeliidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Platycythara
